title: 746: BITCOIN WILL PEAK AT $235K, ETHEREUM AT $22K THIS CYCLE IF 2016 HALVING BTC BULL RUN REPEATS!!
description:
Bitcoin price may be over seven times higher than at its last halving, but if history repeats, that number could grow another 300% with a BTC price peak as much as $253,800.

Ethereum saw much larger comparative gains relative to Bitcoin - 120 times its halving price marked last cycle’s peak in 2018. Thus, a repeat performance would mean ETH/USD trading at $22,300.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YT channel at: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
